name: safr
description: GUI for visualizing chemical hazards and FR positions.

scripts.docker:local: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag
scripts.build-docker: npm run build && npm run tag-docker
scripts.build: docker build --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) -t erikvullings/safr:latest .
scripts.tag-docker: npm run tag-latest && npm run tag-commit
scripts.tag-commit: docker tag erikvullings/safr:latest erikvullings/safr:$(git rev-parse HEAD)
scripts.push-docker: npm run push-latest && npm run push-commit

author: Timo van der Kuil <timo_kuil@hotmail.com>, Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@tno.nl> (http://www.tno.nl)
